= Sample Output=

----
==Sample 1==
This sample converts a basic proto file called _addressbook.proto_ into DocBook and PDF.

[http://protoc-gen-docbook.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/addressbook_big.PNG http://protoc-gen-docbook.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/addressbook_small.PNG]

 * [http://protoc-gen-docbook.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/samples/address_book/addressbook.xml DocBook]

 * [http://protoc-gen-docbook.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/samples/address_book/addressbook.proto Proto]

----

==Sample 2==
Similar to the previous example, this shows a different color scheme of the same output. The color scheme is fully configurable in protoc-gen-docbook through the _docbook.properties_ file.

[http://protoc-gen-docbook.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/addressbook_theme_big.PNG http://protoc-gen-docbook.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/addressbook_theme_small.PNG]

 * [http://protoc-gen-docbook.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/samples/address_book/addressbook_green.pdf PDF]

 * [http://protoc-gen-docbook.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/samples/address_book/addressbook_green.xml DocBook]

 * [http://protoc-gen-docbook.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/samples/address_book/addressbook.proto Proto]

----
==Sample 3==
This example comes from a proto file called [http://code.google.com/p/protobuf/source/browse/trunk/src/google/protobuf/descriptor.proto descriptor.proto]. It is used by protoc to describe a .proto file. This example shows a more complex yet realistic output from protoc-gen-docbook.

[http://protoc-gen-docbook.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/descriptor_sample_big.PNG http://protoc-gen-docbook.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/descriptor_sample_small.png]

 * [http://protoc-gen-docbook.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/samples/descriptor/descriptor.pdf PDF]

 * [http://protoc-gen-docbook.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/samples/descriptor/descriptor.xml DocBook]

 * [http://protoc-gen-docbook.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/samples/descriptor/descriptor.proto Proto]
